content:
You should probably put the non-golf solution here because otherwise everyone who has access to this section will just copy it.
Anyway, nice clash. Approved.

*Very* easy clash, I'm introducing it:
- so that the somewhat harder "Median" one gets something  to be confused with in REVERSE mode
- because I couldn't find an equivalent

It's still golf-fun fodder, though.

First paragraph is from Wikipedia; test cases are from "Median" except for the last one (I brought it back to an integral result so I didn't have to specify how to round for display)

I'm pretty sure anyone who still clashes can do better than that. :D

But, ok, concealing.

I just typed out a 10-line Perl program in strict mode that did the right thing on first try with no testing prior to submission.

That wasn't a clash, but I feel kind of good anyway \o/

I think your golfy solution might have been the shortest you can do in Perl.
And when it comes to other golfers, most use Ruby or Python, and you have to handle the int vs float case for output there.
